quotes.q: Life is filled with secrets. You can't learn them all at once.
If he cannot stop the mind that seeks after fame and profit, he will spend his life without finding peace.
Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.
To do great work one must be very idle as well as very industrious.
If you cling to a certain thought with dynamic will power, it finally assumes a tangible outward form.
Absurdity is the ecstasy of intellectualism.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it.
Where words fail, music speaks.
There is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
Get mad, then get over it.
A simple rule in dealing with those who are hard to get along with is to remember that this person is striving to assert his superiority; and you must deal with him from that point of view.
It is secondary whether we choose belief or defiance. What is precious is that we are always able to choose.
Live in each season as it passes; breathe the air, drink the drink, taste the fruit, and resign yourself to the influence of the earth.
Everyone has oceans to fly, if they have the heart to do it. Is it reckless? Maybe. But what do dreams know of boundaries.
Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
Surround yourself with people who take their work seriously, but not themselves, those who work hard and play hard.
It's your life; you don't need someone's permission to live the life you want. Be brave to live from your heart.
Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
Chase your passion, not your pension.
Nourish the mind like you would your body. The mind cannot survive on junk food.
One of the really tough things is figuring out what questions to ask. Once you figure out the question, then the answer is relatively easy.
Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
If you are lucky enough to find love, remember it is there and don't throw it away.
I am not proud, but I am happy; and happiness blinds, I think, more than pride.
Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Knowledge isn't power until it is applied.
Whatever satisfies the soul is truth.
Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
There is nothing more frightful than ignorance in action.
The power of man has grown in every sphere, except over himself.
Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
Only he who has no use for the empire is fit to be entrusted with it.
The greatest work that kindness does to others is that it makes them kind themselves.
Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.
He who knows best knows how little he knows.
Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small.
Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
Success is about doing the right thing, not about doing everything right.
Attitude, not aptitude, determines altitude.
I am not absentminded. It is the presence of mind that makes me unaware of everything else.
The health of nations is more important than the wealth of nations.
Death walks faster than the wind and never returns what he has taken.
The only people without problems are those in cemeteries.
Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
The traveler sees what he sees. The tourist sees what he has come to see.
It's easier to lose than to win.
